title: News24.com | Lockdown: Joburg man arrested after trying to visit his girlfriend
description: At least 17 people have been arrested in Johannesburg on Friday for failing to comply with the lockdown regulations.
content:
At least 17 people were arrested in Johannesburg on Friday for failing to comply with the lockdown regulations.
Mayor Geoffrey Makhubo, along with the Johannesburg Metropolitan Police Department (JMPD), held two roadside check operations to check the complia… [+1756 chars]
